value: {"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2503.24313v1", "title": "1-Tb/s/\u03bb Transmission over Record 10714-km AR-HCF", "summary": "We present the first single-channel 1.001-Tb/s DP-36QAM-PCS recirculating\ntransmission over 73 loops of 146.77-km ultra-low-loss & low-IMI DNANF-5 fiber,\nachieving a record transmission distance of 10,714.28 km.", "main_category": "physics.optics", "categories": "physics.optics,eess.SP", "published": "2025-03-31T17:01:01Z"}
